p:
Hannesson ( 1983) and Eide et al. ( 2003) suggest that the stock-output elasticities in harvest production differ significantly between fleet groups in the NEA cod fishery. In order to accommodate different stock-output elasticities for coastal and high sea fishing vessels, a Cobb–Douglas product equation is used to express the monthly fleet harvest (

h i
) in cell i when fishing effort is

and stock biomass
